name: Jack and the Beanstalk
description:
A game based on the story "Jack and the Beanstalk" for the GDL September Jam.

Play as Jack, run from the giant, then beat him up in an epic boss fight. With eggs!

Credits

By Team That Thing:

-Edo (music)

-Eylon (programming, game design)

-Idan (programming, game design, art and sfx)

-Yonatan (art)

Note: the game might not work well on slower computers
